27   
28  """Manage icons and artworks""" 
29   
30  import os 
31  import settings 
32   
33  icon16 = lambda name:os.path.join(settings.CAMELOT_ART_DIRECTORY, 
34                                    'tango/16x16', 
35                                    '%s.png'%name) 
36   
37  icon24 = lambda name:os.path.join(settings.CAMELOT_ART_DIRECTORY, 
38                                    'tango/24x24', 
39                                    '%s.png'%name) 
40   
41  icon32 = lambda name:os.path.join(settings.CAMELOT_ART_DIRECTORY, 
42                                    'tango/32x32', 
43                                    '%s.png'%name) 
44   
45  file_ = lambda name:os.path.join(settings.CAMELOT_ART_DIRECTORY, '%s'%name) 
46
